meta.title: Discover and Learn AI Tools with AiToolGo | Your AI Learning Platform
meta.description: Find the best AI tools and learning resources tailored to your needs at AiToolGo. Empower your AI journey with solutions for everyone, regardless of background or expertise. Join our community today!

footer.introduce:
Welcome to AiToolGo, your one-stop platform for discovering, learning, and empowering yourself with top AI tools and learning resources!

We believe AI should be accessible and empowering for everyone. That's why we offer a curated collection of AI tools, tutorials, use cases, and expert insights across various industries. Whether you're a beginner or a pro, AiToolGo is here to help you excel in AI skills.Join our community and unlock the potential of AI for your life and work.

Discover, Learn, and Empower with AI Tool, Go!

termsOfService.title: AiToolGo Terms of Service
termsOfService.Welcome Tip: These terms and conditions ("Terms") govern your use of our website ("Website" or "Service"). Please read these Terms carefully as they contain important information about your rights and obligations. If you do not agree with these Terms, please do not use our Website.
termsOfService.c1: By accessing or using AiToolGo, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you are using the Website on behalf of an entity, you represent and warrant that you have the authority to accept these Terms on behalf of that entity.
termsOfService.c2: We may update these Terms from time to time. The updated Terms will be posted on this page with the effective date. Please review these Terms periodically to stay informed of any changes. Your continued use of the Website after any changes constitutes your acceptance of the new Terms.
termsOfService.c3:
You agree to use the Website only for lawful purposes and not to engage in any of the following activities:
 • Violating any applicable laws or regulations
 • Infringing or misappropriating our intellectual property
 • Interfering with or disrupting the operation of the Website
 • Attempting to gain unauthorized access to any part of the Website or other users' accounts
termsOfService.c4: Certain features may require you to register an account. You agree to provide accurate and complete registration information and to keep your account information up to date. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account password and for all activities that occur under your account. You must notify us immediately of any unauthorized use or security breach.
termsOfService.c5: Unless otherwise stated, all content on the Website, including but not limited to text, images, graphics, logos, button icons, video, and audio clips, is the property of AiToolGo or its licensors and is protected by copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws. You may not copy, modify, distribute, transmit, display, perform, publish, or sell any content without our express written consent or the consent of the relevant rights holder.
termsOfService.c6: Some of the learning data and content on our Website may be sourced from other websites. We strive to ensure the accuracy and legality of this content, but we cannot guarantee it is free from infringement risks. If you believe that any content on our Website infringes your copyright or other rights, please contact us immediately. We will investigate and take appropriate action upon receiving such notification.
termsOfService.c7: Our Website is provided on an "as is" and "as available" basis, without any warranties of any kind, either express or implied. We do not guarantee the accuracy, completeness, reliability, or availability of the Website. We disclaim all warranties, express or implied, including but not limited to implied warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, and non-infringement.
termsOfService.c8: To the maximum extent permitted by applicable law, we shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages, including but not limited to damages for loss of profits, data, or other intangible losses, resulting from your use of or inability to use the Website, even if we have been advised of the possibility of such damages.
termsOfService.c9: We reserve the right to terminate or suspend your access to the Website at any time, with or without cause or notice. Upon termination, your right to use the Website will immediately cease.
termsOfService.c10: These Terms are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the United States. You agree that any disputes arising out of or relating to these Terms will be resolved in the courts of the United States.
termsOfService.c11:
If you have any questions or require further information about these Terms, please contact us at:
Email: support@aitoolgo.com

privacyPolicy.title: AiToolGo Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.Welcome Tip: Welcome to AiToolGo (“we” or “our website”). We value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information. The following privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information.
privacyPolicy.c1:
We may collect the following types of information:
 • Personal Information: This includes but is not limited to your name, email address, avatar, and IP address.
 • Non-Personal Information: This includes non-personal information collected through Google Analytics, such as browser type, operating system, access times and dates, and pages visited.
privacyPolicy.c2:
The information we collect is used for the following purposes:
 • To provide and improve our services
 • To personalize user experience
 • To send notifications and updates
 • To analyze website usage and trends
privacyPolicy.c3:
We do not share your personal information with third parties except in the following circumstances:
 • With your explicit consent
 • To comply with legal obligations
 • To protect our rights and safety
We only share non-personal information with Google Analytics for the purpose of analyzing and improving our website.
privacyPolicy.c4: We take appropriate security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, disclosure, or alteration. We use encryption technology and other security measures to ensure the safety of your data.
privacyPolicy.c5: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. To exercise these rights, please contact us using the contact information provided below.
privacyPolicy.c6: Our website uses cookies and other tracking technologies to enhance user experience, analyze usage trends, and manage the website. You can manage the use of cookies through your browser settings.
privacyPolicy.c7: We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under the age of 13. If we become aware that we have inadvertently collected personal information from a child under the age of 13, we will take steps to delete such information.
privacyPolicy.c8: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. The updated privacy policy will be posted on this page with the effective date. Please review it periodically to stay informed of any changes.
privacyPolicy.c9:
If you have any questions or require further information about our privacy policy, please contact us at:
Email: support@aitoolgo.com
